text.func: __ht__function(data, view){return data.a('textData')&&data.a('textData').map(res => {if (res.condition.rule==='~'?eval(res.condition.rule + data.a('value')):eval(data.a('value') + res.condition.rule +  res.condition.num)) {return res&&res.label;}}).filter(res=>{return res !== undefined})[0]}

color.func: __ht__function(data, view){  return data.a('textData')&&data.a('textData').map(res => { if (res.condition.rule==='~'?eval(res.condition.rule + data.a('value')):eval(data.a('value') + res.condition.rule +  res.condition.num)) {return res&&res.textColor;}}).filter(res=>{return res !== undefined})[0]||data.s('text.color')}

align.func: __ht__function(data, view){  return data.a('textData')&&data.a('textData').map(res => { if (res.condition.rule==='~'?eval(res.condition.rule + data.a('value')):eval(data.a('value') + res.condition.rule +  res.condition.num)) {return res&&res.align;}}).filter(res=>{return res !== undefined})[0]}

vAlign.func: __ht__function(data, view){  return data.a('textData')&&data.a('textData').map(res => { if (res.condition.rule==='~'?eval(res.condition.rule + data.a('value')):eval(data.a('value') + res.condition.rule +  res.condition.num)) {return res&&res.vAlign;}}).filter(res=>{return res !== undefined})[0]}

font.func: __ht__function(data, view){  return data.a('textData')&&data.a('textData').map(res => { if (res.condition.rule==='~'?eval(res.condition.rule + data.a('value')):eval(data.a('value') + res.condition.rule +  res.condition.num)) {return res&&res.font;}}).filter(res=>{return res !== undefined})[0]}
